definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
double income family who have pets rather than children (see also 丁克[ding1 ke4])
a family bereaved of its only child
rural household contract responsibility system, PRC government policy linking rural income to productivity
pinyin: nong2 cun1 jia1 ting2 lian2 chan3 cheng2 bao1 ze2 ren4 zhi4
containing_words.word: 农村家庭联产承包责任制

sentences.english: A happy family is much more important than money.
sentences.chinese: 幸福家庭比金钱更重要。

sentences.english: Millions of residences remain without power and water.
sentences.chinese: 数百万户家庭依然断水断电。

sentences.english: Do you do homework every day?
sentences.chinese: 你们每天都做家庭作业吗？

sentences.english: But developers have little incentive to build less-profitable units for low-income households.
sentences.chinese: 但开发商不愿为低收入家庭建造低利润的单元房。

sentences.english: My ideal match is a woman with a good sense of family.
sentences.chinese: 我的理想对象是要有好的家庭观。

sentences.english: When Natalie finds out he is a detective she tells him to stay away from her family.
sentences.chinese: 当纳塔莉发现他是一名侦探，她告诉他远离她的家庭。

sentences.english: The disagreement among the family members healed over with time.
sentences.chinese: 家庭成员之间的不和随着时间的流逝而消失。

sentences.english: And it illustrates the larger trend of home automation that is catching on among do-it-yourselfers.
sentences.chinese: 这说明家庭自动化的大趋势就是自己动手。

sentences.english: This weekend I'm going to install a home security system.
sentences.chinese: 这个周末我要装一套家庭保安系统。

sentences.english: What constitutes spanking in a family can vary widely.
sentences.chinese: 每个家庭打屁股的具体方式也很不一样。

sentences.english: Mr Fukuda, by contrast, has a family legacy to enshrine.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，福田康夫有参拜神庙的家庭传统。

sentences.english: Our family are very very good.
sentences.chinese: 我们的家庭非常非常好。

sentences.english: North Korea also prohibited reunions between North and South Korean families.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜作为报复停止了让朝鲜和韩国失散家庭团聚。

sentences.english: You may want to make changes in your home environment.
sentences.chinese: 本周也许你会希望在你的家庭环境中做出些改变。

sentences.english: They are currently in the process of piloting two programs aimed at getting families outdoors.
sentences.chinese: 他们最近还在实施另两个旨在让家庭走向户外的项目。

sentences.english: All told, this will not only directly help  families and businesses.
sentences.chinese: 总之，这项计划不仅仅会直接帮助家庭和企业。
